org.xmlunit.matchers.HasXPathMatcher

Description
org.xmlunit.matchers
Hamcrest matchers on top of XMLUnit's core.

  • Uses of HasXPathMatcher in org.xmlunit.matchers

    Methods in org.xmlunit.matchers that return HasXPathMatcher
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static HasXPathMatcher
    HasXPathMatcher.hasXPath(String xPath)
    Creates a matcher that matches when the examined XML input has at least one node corresponding to the specified xPath.
    HasXPathMatcher
    HasXPathMatcher.withDocumentBuilderFactory(DocumentBuilderFactory f)
    Sets the DocumentBuilderFactory to use when creating a Document from the XML input.
    HasXPathMatcher
    HasXPathMatcher.withNamespaceContext(Map<String,String> prefix2Uri)
    Utility method used for creating a namespace context mapping to be used in XPath matching.
    HasXPathMatcher
    HasXPathMatcher.withXPathFactory(XPathFactory f)
    Sets the XPathFactory to use.
